summary: When a plant or company closes down or moves, there are some federal programs to help workers adjust to losing their jobs. For example, the Appalachian Regional Commission (ARC) and the Department of Labor both give state and local organizations grants to provide job training and counseling services. We reviewed these grants and found that: Labor did not process some grant applications in a timely...
title: Economic Adjustment Assistance: Actions Needed to Better Address Workers' Needs and Assess Program Effectiveness
